FuncDef:
The description command configures a description for an ACL6.
The undo description command restores the default description of an ACL6. The description command configures a description for an ACL6. The undo description command restores the default description of an ACL6. By default, no description is configured for an ACL6.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the description of an ACL6.
The value is a string of 1 to 127 case-sensitive characters, spaces supported. The value must not start with spaces and can be a combination of letters, numbers, and spaces.

Examples: [*HUAWEI-acl6-advance-3100] description This acl is used in 100GE 1/0/1
ExtraInfo: The description command configures a description for an ACL6 in any of the following situations:
